name: lacework-cli
postCreateCommand: zsh -c 'lacework completion zsh > ${HOME}/.oh-my-zsh/completions/_lacework && omz reload && if [ -f ${HOME}/.lacework.toml ]; then mv ${HOME}/.lacework.toml /dc/lacework-cli/.lacework.toml; else touch /dc/lacework-cli/.lacework.toml; fi && ln -sf /dc/lacework-cli/.lacework.toml ${HOME}/.lacework.toml'
